values: first of all let me start with everybody and their mom has a myspace now.....im kind of a hypocrite for what im about to say but fuck it, i fucking hate all these damn to round them all up 'journals'. its hard for me to understand why people write in these specifically for other people to read them but then again....<-second thing, i dont even no if anyone still will read this cuz they all got a 'my space4'...i for one am not going to have one becuz im not goin thru the trouble of settin it up to tell people about my life....but at the same time you wanna tell people whats going on....im haveing a mid-life crisis, not really but it just fucking boggles my mind. kinda just ignore all that<-- if you wanna do it im not gonna complain, 3rd of all im not changing my backround its gonna stay this marilyn manson thing becuz i dont really give a fuck, anyway i cant remember the last time i smoked weed, i dont ever wanna do it again, my close friends my be like 'pff yeah ed weeds REAALL bad for you, dick', becuz they no i occasionally do other stuff, fuck ocassionally like 3 or 4 times a week. no not heroin or nothing....perks...well not heroin in the way people usually think.they're so bad for your body in the long run but they make you feel soo chillin, and all scratchy and its just the best. and no i wont turn down the occasional line of yoke, i no its disgusting and all that but it makes you feel good,. anyway im alive hit me up
